name: No Seat?
description: No Seat? is a unique trial bike game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core i5 equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia gtx 760 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: n/a Additional Notes: Tested on nVidia gtx 760
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8/10 Processor: Core i7 equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: nvidia 980 equivelant DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: n/a Additional Notes: Tested on nVidia gtx 760
